name: fo_dev
description: This is a demo for Fair Observer

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.server.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.dist.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.css.js --mode production && python2 scripts/injectcss.py
scripts.develop: webpack --config webpack.server.js --mode development && webpack --config webpack.dist.js --mode development && webpack --config webpack.css.js --mode development && python2 scripts/injectcss.py

author: Alexander Coward
